com.google.template.soy.shared.internal

Class ApiCallScopeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.template.soy.shared.internal.ApiCallScopeUtils

  • public class ApiCallScopeUtils
extends Object
    Shared utilities for working with the ApiCallScope.

    Important: Do not use outside of Soy code (treat as superpackage-private).

      • seedSharedParams

        public static void seedSharedParams(GuiceSimpleScope apiCallScope,
                                    @Nullable
                                    SoyMsgBundle msgBundle,
                                    @Nullable
                                    BidiGlobalDir bidiGlobalDir)
        Helper utility to seed params shared by multiple backends.
        Parameters:
        apiCallScope - The scope object that manages the API call scope.
        msgBundle - The bundle of translated messages, or null to use the messages from the Soy
        bidiGlobalDir - The bidi global directionality. If null, it is derived from the msgBundle locale, if any, otherwise ltr.

      • seedSharedParams

                                    BidiGlobalDir bidiGlobalDir,
                                    @Nullable
                                    String localeString)
        Helper utility to seed params shared by multiple backends.
        Parameters:
        apiCallScope - The scope object that manages the API call scope.
        bidiGlobalDir - The bidi global directionality.
        localeString - The current locale.
